name: Petrus
description:
Petrus a.k.a. Penembak Misterius a.k.a. Mysterious Shooter.

A piece from my "Best Sellers" series, which depicts Indonesia's New Order through popular culture associated with the events of the time.

During the New Order era in Indonesia, thousands of criminals were executed extrajudicially by mysterious snipers in the early to mid-1980s. For street criminals at the time, the phrase "Petrus - Penembak Misterius" was terrifying.

Photo reference: Tom Berenger in Sniper 2.
